mapper.sql: cid, title, slug, created, modified, author_id, type, status, tags, categories, hits, comments_num, allow_comment, allow_ping, allow_feed
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from t_contents
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_contents (cid, title, slug, created, modified, author_id, type, status, tags, categories, hits, comments_num, allow_comment, allow_ping, allow_feed, content) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modified,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{allowComment,jdbcType=BIT}, #{allowPing,jdbcType=BIT}, #{allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

cid,

mapper.update:
update t_contents
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{record.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
slug = #{record.slug,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{record.created,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{record.modified,jdbcType=INTEGER},
author_id = #{record.authorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

allow_comment = #{record.allowComment,jdbcType=BIT},
allow_ping = #{record.allowPing,jdbcType=BIT},
allow_feed = #{record.allowFeed,jdbcType=BIT},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

mapper.select: select FROM_UNIXTIME(created, '%Y年%m月') as date, count(*) as count from t_contents where type = 'post' and status = 'publish' group by date order by date desc
select a.* from t_contents a left join t_relationships b on a.cid = b.cid where b.mid = #{value} and a.status = 'publish' and a.type = 'post' order by a.created desc
